com.silvergobletgames.sylver.core

Class EngineSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.silvergobletgames.sylver.core.EngineSettings

  • public class EngineSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a class that contains all of the settings for the engines graphics and audio pipelines. These settings are intended to be player facing settings. This class is passed into the game as part of the GameConfiguration. This class comes with helper methods that provides read/write functionality to an .ini file to save the settings.

    • Method Detail

      • dumpSettingsToFile

        public void dumpSettingsToFile(java.net.URI filePath)
        Dump the engine settings to an .ini file with given path. Path must include the filename
        Parameters:
        filePath - URI to dump the file. Must include the filename. eg. C:\folder\engineSettings.ini

      • constructFromFile

        public static EngineSettings constructFromFile(java.net.URI filePath)
        Load the settings in from a file.
        Parameters:
        filePath - URI to .ini file that contains the settings to load
        Returns:
        returns a constructed EngineSettings object with the settings from the file
